documents.title: Product Overview
documents.text: Datapillar is a data development SaaS platform that covers data ingestion, modeling, metrics, scheduling, and quality management. It emphasizes standardization and reuse, and supports team collaboration and access isolation.

documents.title: Knowledge Framework
documents.text: The knowledge framework provides document parsing, chunking, vectorization, and retrieval-augmented capabilities. It can be attached to teams or agents and supports parameter overrides and context injection.

documents.title: Retrieval Workflow
documents.text: The retrieval workflow includes recall, reranking, evidence governance, and context formatting. Evidence governance groups, deduplicates, and enforces per-document limits to keep outputs stable and controlled.

documents.title: Process Modes
documents.text: Datapillar supports SEQUENTIAL, DYNAMIC, HIERARCHICAL, MAPREDUCE, REACT process modes for task decomposition, delegation, and collaboration.

queries.query: What core capabilities does Datapillar cover?
What capabilities does the knowledge framework provide?
What steps are in the retrieval workflow?
What process modes does the system support?
